lender.loan_because: I wish to help those who are sincere, honest and hard working. We are all apart of the human family sharing the same Spirit of God.

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: It's practical, and tangible. Not going to lie. I'm in a kind of strange place, and it's not because Jesus told me to, or because I feel guilty about being a rich American, or because I feel bad for the poor African kids. I loan because I can help the world, and those not lucky enough to be born in America, in a very tangible, very real way, and I think that's something that we, as humans, should do. That's it.
lender.occupational_info: I graduated from Seattle Pacific University and double-majored in Computer Science and Electrical Engineering. I currently work as a web developer, building a web application.

lender.name: Ping Chu
lender.loan_because: I believe that entrepreneurship is the best way to create jobs and resolve poverty.

lender.name: Janaka
lender.loan_because: Dear All Please visit our site and see our progress. I need to provide a Personal Computer to all of our members of my village. Please help us to buy computers. (one PC = $1100) We can repay it; we hope to collect money by arranging raffles and showing stage drama and etc.
lender.occupational_info: Our organisation started for underprivileged students in order to develop skills in English and IT. A few years later the organisations objectives widened to provide some very needy students with personal computers and a small monthly amount for their studies. We are now happy to say that ICTA and the government have nominated our village as an e-village. Our members are very young students and they are developing small softwares, and our web-site and a few more other websites are maintained by them. The founder, treasurer and chairman are there for the management and financial side, but the organisation is basically run by the students themselves. Prior to the implementation of this project, the computer literacy in our village was low. The village not only lacked the infrastructure necessary to provide computer training programmes, but the insufficient transportation services prevented them from accessing programmes conducted in the towns. This placed our villagers, especially the youth, at a disadvantage when applying for employment opportunities, as a basic knowledge of IT is a requirement in almost all technical positions. However, through our project, we are not only improving their accessibility to IT tools, but we are helping them develop proficiency in the English language. These are services that would not have been available to our villagers, had our programme not been initiated.

lender.name: Chris Johnson
lender.occupational_info: Veterinarian Clinic provides a resource to help you ensure your pets health and well being.

lender.name: Jeff and Becca
lender.loan_because: every life has equal value. We believe each citizen of the world should be afforded the opportunity to achieve their dreams. We'd like to play a part in working with others to achieve their dreams!

lender.name: Azienda agricola ZIPO
lender.loan_because:
vogliamo finanziare persone bisognose che operano nei nostri stessi settori (coltivazione, allevamento, caseificazione, vendita prodotti alimentari artigianali) devolvendo parte del ricavato mensile del nostro distributore di latte crudo a Zibido San Giacomo (Milano).
we loan to help people who work in our same fields (agriculture, livestock, cheese production and direct selling, farmer's market) devolving monthly a part of the proceeds of our automatic machine which sells raw milk, in Zibido San Giacomo (Milan, Italy).
lender.occupational_info:
Nel cuore del Parco Agricolo Sud Milano, a Zibido San Giacomo, unantica cascina ricca di storia, sapientemente restaurata, offre ai suoi visitatori prati coltivati con metodi attenti alla natura, prodotti a filiera corta ed una stalla dove le mucche sono felici!
In the Agricultural Park of Southern Milan, in Zibido San Giacomo, an old farmhouse rich of history and carefully restored, offers to its visitors fields cultivated with nature-friendly methods, goods sold directly to the pubblic and a barn where cows are happy!

lender.name: Olusegun
lender.loan_because: I want to start a bar and salon business....

lender.name: Kelsey
lender.loan_because: I loan to connect with people all over, to learn more about their lives and give them my support!

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: My daughter had an account and she set up one for me as my Mother's Day present.

lender.name: Vincent
lender.loan_because: I want.

lender.name: Alexa Humphreys
lender.loan_because: The uneven distribution of wealth in the world today is an unfortunate reality. More than half of the people on this planet subsist on less than $2.00 each day. If I can do something as simple as loan a few hundred dollars and help someone to better themselves... I'm in.

lender.name: Gregory
lender.loan_because:
Vision: 1. To build a people business of public & private capital partners that have a natural attraction to people building sustainable communities.
2. To provide families access to affordable housing and wealth building education & training.
3. To build a scalable and profitable portfolio for team members and investors.
lender.occupational_info:
"We are building a people business for people building a business...
Purpose: 1. To give a life of hope, happiness, and a helping hand to everyone that wants to experience the lifestyle of making a living...living their life in style.
2. To create perpetual streams of residual revenue to fund additional investment projects.
3. To help provide OPE-other peoples education, explanation, examples, and experiences of lower cost to start with proven ways for higher returns so every person has a chance or second chance to reach a financially free lifestyle in their lifetime.
Mission: 1. To help 1000 people times 1000 people build a strong financial freedom with multiple cash flows by 2020.
2. To help 1000 people each week to move money up to $$$ 3-figures to make money up to $$$,$$$ 6-figures cash flow as a group.

lender.name: Cheryl & Steve
lender.loan_because: Both of us have spent our entire careers in not- for- profit work. We have been blessed with good lives and know that God counts on people like us to share with others so they can have a good life too.
lender.occupational_info: Steve is a YMCA director. Cheryl is a fundraiser for Catholic health care. We have three children ages 24-30. Two of them also work for non profits. Together, we love sailing near our home in San Pedro, California. Cheryl loves to paint and write poetry.

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: I care, and I believe in you.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher in an American Public School.

lender.name: Lucy
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is to run a business on your own, and I want to help women in much more difficult circumstances then my own do just that.

lender.name: Todays Harvest
lender.occupation: Producer of Chalsa a salsa type product
lender.loan_because: We need to help each other in the world to succeed. There is enough hate and injustice in the world as it is everyday we have to fight to make a jar of salsa to sell as the so called stimulus is no where in sight. So if we can help with small loans to our fellow food producers then we have achieved something worthwhile in our lives.
lender.occupational_info:
We make a product that was created by my grandmother and given to my mom who gave it to me. I cooked it for decades before being asked to create it into a product for the world to delight in. Never knowing all along that right there in front of my eyes was what I had been looking for in life all along.
I wish I had figured this out years ago, it might of saved me from being so lost for so many years. I hope that our small loans will save someone the same anguish I went through and give them a new life that will provide for them and their family.
We hope someday to teach people around the world to cook, grow food, and more. Just a way of paying back a small portion of what god has given me in my life.

lender.name: Benjamin Young
lender.loan_because: As an experiment, the microfinance model is an interesting concept that has the potential to improve the lives of hard-working people in developing nations.
lender.occupational_info: At the American Red Cross in Greater New York, I work in partnership with the Community Development Director, staff members, volunteers and other locally based organizations. I advocate disaster readiness, emergency preparedness and volunteerism to the community through outreach efforts, presentations and a wide variety of events.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: Kiva is such a great opportunity to help others. I'm honored to be a part of such a thoughtful group of lenders.
lender.occupational_info: I do 1 hour and 1.5 hour psychic readings and energy healings by phone or in-person. I live in Chicago, IL, United States. I have clients that live all over the US and some that live in other countries as well. I do NOT read the future. I read a client's energy now, in the moment, and can also read one's past and past lives if it is helpful. I am a psychic clairvoyant reader which means I close my eyes, see images, and interpret them. I read one's aura, chakras, relationships, etc. I am a conscious telepath so I can hear a client's angels and can tell the client what they say. I can also help you to hear your own angels more over time. I love my work because I love helping people to empower themselves and make desired changes in their lives. I can also teach clients to do custom meditations or do energy healing on themselves within a reading session, if they wish. I am very down-to-earth, so no previous experience or knowledge is required.

lender.name: Angela

I work in aquatic ecology, where you study life and the interactions between organisms in lakes, rivers and other types of water.

In loving memory to a great woman, grandma and grand grandma.
